content.text:
**Ledbetter.Games**

*We make games for the Playdate.*
The Little Yellow Console with a Crank is a system with charm and limitations.
1-bit. Limited Inputs. Small screen.
Yet the Playdate is Open and Accessible in ways unique in the gaming industry! Around these limitations we can push interesting gameplay and new controls. We can execute game design quickly and efficiently and we can publish independently or through Panic.
Our games are primarily sold through the Playdate Catalog and our more experimental titles are available on Itch.io
Ledbetter Games is the Developer of PUP CUP, Off-Planet Dreams and the ART series for the Playdate including ART7, ART-O-Ween, ART&.. More and the Panels Comic A Ghost in the Gallery.
We have also released HALL of the DWARF KING, Chek: 2 or 4 Player Board Game and Dog kNOwSE Ch 1 The Dame.

content.text:
**Hall of the Dwarf King**
*Coming to Catalog 8/5/2025*

*Your party is stranded in the Dungeon of N'ven. As you come to, you are faced with a number of Creatures you must survive before help comes to you.. if you are worthy!*
This is a Playdate game built to guide players through a series of encounters as three characters. Playing via Mirror or Pass'n'Play is encouraged for a co-op puzzle crawling experience!
Additionally, download PDF files to cut and print the Dungeon Screenshot gameboard, Creature Cards and Power Tiles in order to play Hall of the Dwarf King IN REAL LIFE! The Playdate will guide your play, use these materials for visuals and Creature order!
A lightform DnD session administered by a game has long been kicking around my brainpan. This happened to be the perfect opportunity to try it out!

content.text:
**PUP CUP**

*Serve pups treatos all over the world in this arcade-style, round-based, Root-like score-chaser!*
Every time you open your ‘cup cart’ you’ll find a line of pups just waiting for some delicious whipped treats. Crank forward to fill the cup to the Good Boy Zone and Crank back to serve. Be careful not to make a mess!
In Borks mode, use the D-Pad to add toppings & headpats for a time bonus. That’s right.. YOU CAN PET THE DOG!
All dogs pay in tail wags. Each round is a minute(?) How many Pups can you Cup?

content.text:
**Off-Planet Dreams**

*PULP Game of the Year 2024!*
Off-Planet Dreams is an invisible puzzle platformer where dying is feedback, death is information. As you move about each level, your mind will fill in the blanks and any deaths are simply an instant restart showing you where *Not* to go.
But accessibility is key! In all invisible levels, you have the ability to:

items: *Peek* - see what is immediately around you
*Paint* - leave a trail wherever you have touched
*Show* - fully reveal the level from the B menu

content.text:
**The ART Series**

ART7 is an open-world 1-bit Art Gallery for the Playdate Handheld Console.
ART-O-Ween: Night at the Gallery is a Spooky adventure game set on the expanded grounds of ART7, including new characters, mechanics, and an all-new ART-O-Ween exhibit from members of the Playdate Community!
In ART-O-Ween, you spend a night guarding the gallery due to some.. circumstances. Try to keep things clean while helping out members of the community. You can Win! You can Lose! You can Die! You’ll enjoy some new ART!  Grab a costume and enjoy a… Night at the Gallery!
ART&.. More is an open-world 1-bit ART gallery for Playdate with exploration/collecting, fishing and arcade games!
Your character, Bop, is a little floating eyeball enjoying the new exhibits. Wander through the gallery, talk to patrons, visit the giftshop and explore the grounds!
